settings.job_position: Monthly curation of premium beauty products across cosmetics, skincare, haircare and fragrance. Minimum of five luxury products per month. A monthly copy of our Cohorted Beauty Box Booklet Mini Magazine. Reliable dispatch straight to your door in bespoke 100% recyclable packaging. Exclusive offers and discounts available to Cohorted subscribers.

The Cohorted Beauty Box subscription works one month in advance. This means that you will receive your first beauty box between the 5th and the 15th of the following month. For example, if you sign up in January your first box will be the February edition. All of our boxes are hand-wrapped in 100% sustainable packaging. For your peace of mind, we send all of our boxes using 48 hour recorded delivery.

Payment for your first Beauty Box will be taken when you sign up. You will then be billed on a rolling monthly basis between the 1st and 3rd of each month until a request for cancellation is submitted. Our subscription is completely flexible allowing you to cancel or pause your subscription at any time. You can simply process the request from your Subscription Dashboard or send a request to our customer service team before the last day of each month.

settings.title: How Our Monthly Beauty Box Works
What's In The Box?
settings.text:
The Cohorted Beauty Box is the UK’s leading luxury subscription box. Each month, you will receive a curation of hand-picked, premium products, approved by our in-house beauty experts.

From makeup and skincare to fragrance and haircare, experiment with cult-favourite brands and products and discover the latest in luxury beauty. The Cohorted Beauty Box is the ultimate premium beauty experience. Guaranteed a minimum of six products worth £100+, your monthly delivery will arrive in our 100% sleek and sustainable packaging and won’t disappoint.

Available across the UK and internationally, our beauty box curations are the perfect monthly pick-me-up.

settings.title:
This Month's
Sneak Peek
settings.text:
Our #ColorWowExclusive edit features the award winning luxurious Dream Coat Supernatural Spray. Achieve lushious locks with a silicone free spray that simultanedously combats frizz, controls moisture levels and smooths each hair fibre.

Worth £25.00. Subscribe before August 31st to secure your September Cohorted Beauty Box…

settings.title: Cohorted Beauty Box May Unboxing With Lady Writes
settings.text: Get a Sneak Peek inside May's Cohorted Beauty Subscription Beauty Box. This one is the Wellness edit which contains £175 worth of products!

settings.heading: Why Cohorted?
settings.text: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that i
settings.text2:
As the first 100% sustainable UK beauty box, we encourage our customers to become conscious cosmetic consumers. Together we can all make a small difference, which could lead to big changes.

Bringing forward brands and products which are increasingly sustainable and produced with ecological awareness in mind helps us move closer to a cleaner planet.

Our Beauty for Conservation movement strives to aid conscious purchasing, by offering products which our customers can feel confident about. We’re committed to lowering our environmental impact wherever possible. As a socially responsible business, we want to help address the sustainability challenge that we all face and experience as contributors in the beauty industry.

Cohorted has also pledged to support sustainable organisations and charities, which share the same ecological goals and champion the same aspirational message.

settings.title: Claim Your Free Gift
settings.paragraph: When you subscribe to the Beauty Box, we'll send you this free gift, completely free of charge! Get your FREE L'OCCITANE LTD Immortelle Precieuse 8ml, today when you purchase a subscription. Use the code COHORTEDGIFTME at checkout to redeem.
settings.linktext: Subscribe Now To Get Your Free gift

settings.title: Cohorted Rewards
settings.paragraph: The wait is over, as our exclusive reward scheme is coming this summer! We want to give back to our subscribers and so have lined up some incredible exclusive offers, incentives, competitions and rewards. From beauty and fashion, to lifestyle and culture, discover our reward scheme partners today and let the benefits roll in.

settings.title: Previous Beauty Boxes
settings.paragraph:
Missed a previous beauty box curation? Looking for a special gift for a special someone? Don’t worry, we’ve got you covered here at Cohorted.
Discover the latest in beauty and explore our past’ beauty box curations. Whether you’re looking for a brand exclusive beauty box or a limited edition curation chock-full of beauty favourites, all boxes are beautifully packaged and arrive in our 100% sustainable beauty boxes.
